item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Updated links to domain name.
Fixed a few bugs.
Updated a few player rights when you reach a certain rank.
Added more donator benefits as a BRONZE member, also as a PLATINUM member.
New max players online count as of last night: 19.
MotiVote system working 100%, you get either 1m with 1 vote point per website, or you get 10 minutes of 30% bonus xp per website. Or mix & match. There’s a total of 7 websites to vote on.
Donation system has been updated, working on auto-donations next.
Construction is partially made.
All skills have been fully updated and enhanced more.

COME PLAY TODAY! http://lizardscape.net/play/ note: RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD CLIENT, WEBCLIENT ONLY WORKS IF YOU SET YOUR BROWSER UP FOR JAVA.

Oh, and I gave nobody staff yet, you can’t even donate for staff, I refuse for that to be an option. You must earn it, not donate, nor ask. The only ‘staff’ there are is ‘helpers’. There’s not even moderators or administrators yet. There’s only two helpers. Articipate, and Trevelyan. If need be, I can post my PayPal transaction logs if I really need to. Articipate, a user of my server, has been the only one who donated so far. He donated $40 for dragon claws, chaotic rapier, which costed $25 then $5 for Jad pet.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Just bought a domain and we got MotiVote system now thanks to a developer. You get 1 vote scroll per website (there’s 9), and you choose either 10 minutes of 30% XP boost or you can get 1m and 1 vote point. Vote points are used in the voting shop for unique items.
